page.title: 19Housing
page.content: There are no Council houses in this block. All the houses are privately owned with the exception of 5 tied farm labourer's cottages and the farm houses which are all occupied by tenant farmers, the farms being owned by large estates or consortiums. In Weston Patrick the houses are mostly old 17th Cent. cottages with modern extensions with modern infill housing all of which blends in well. Powntley Copse is an estate of large detached houses built in the 1930's,with 1-2 acre gardens where the owners have set up a Residents Association to manage the maintenance of the road and services. Other housing in the block consists mostly of isolated farmhouses or cottages some of which have been upgraded and modernised and bought by commuters working in London.
